sentences.en: That could abash the little bird.
sentences.cn: 能使小巧的鸟儿备受伤害.

sentences.en: The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentences.cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentences.en: When the child see all the room fille with stranger he is much abash.
sentences.cn: 那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人，感到非常局促不安。

sentences.en: When the child see all the room fille with stranger, he is much abash .
sentences.cn: 中文翻译：那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人， 感到非常局促不安。

sentences.en: When the child see all the room filled with stranger, he is much abash.
sentences.cn: 中文翻译:那小孩一看到满屋子都是陌生人, 感到非常局促不安.

words.tran_cn: 使困窘；使羞愧；使局促不安

trans.tran_en: to cause to feel ill at ease, embarrassed, or confused; make ashamed
